channel.title: Help Needed Fast!
channel.description:
Every time this pops up [code][client-4-hihi]: Fatal: Internal error: unable to determine connection vertex! wp1=(53, 48), wp2=(55, 46), first=(51, 45)[/code]
It lags my server out, how do i fix this?
And what does it mean when it repeats like this when attacking an NPC
[code]Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456[/code]
This Freezes the server for a sec
And Some times when I try to start server up I normally have to close it out and open it 10 times before even I can Connect
I also want to know why blood runes getting banked/unbanked crash the server
and why is it sometimes someone will get disconnected and it will say every one is logged in when there not and wont let any one log in?
Also how do I fix this: [code] java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection abort: recv failed at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at client.packetProcess(client.java:12444) at client.process(client.java:12428) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:136) at server.main(server.java:46) Cheezscape Server [fatal] - exception Game saved for player chad[/code]
I just mainly need a way to stop the lag on my server [br][size=1]Posted at: July 26, 2006, 10:28:40 AM[/size][hr]Somone help please cause the one with the npc Id Over loads the server and freezes it[br][size=1]Posted at: July 28, 2006, 02:32:40 PM[/size][hr]I also did that parseincoming packets thing on packet 40 but i still get errors with it :[br][size=1]Posted at: July 28, 2006, 03:14:29 PM[/size][hr]Every time I get that error for some reason my server laggs reallly bad[br][size=1]Posted at: July 28, 2006, 08:51:50 PM[/size][hr]Once all these get fixed my server can be back up and running with little to no lag[br][size=1]Posted at: July 28, 2006, 09:20:43 PM[/size][hr]This other error pops up somtimes "invalid walking vortext" or somthing of that such and thats lags the server uber bad[br][size=1]Posted at: July 29, 2006, 12:31:43 AM[/size][hr]It seems profiles get reset when there in a trade and get dced[br][size=1]Posted at: July 29, 2006, 01:42:46 PM[/size][hr]Why doesnt anyone ever help me :(?

item.title: Help Needed Fast!
item.dc:creator: @Wolfeyes217 Wolfeyes217
item.description:
@Wolfeyes217 wrote:

all npcs have health i made it so non crashes when you do , i know it tells me the id but sometimes after its toldme the id it reapeats it over and over and over even tho it already said it.

and the multi barrage code caused most the errors

Read full topic

item.title: Help Needed Fast!
item.dc:creator: @jmull jmull
item.description:
@jmull wrote:

about the npc id thing, it’s probably telling you that because some1 is attacking that npc.
how to fix:
easiest: stop attacking it
little bit harder: edit your npc.cfg and look up the npc id that u keep getting, then edit it and give it some health

thats the only reason i can think of that it would crash ur server and that usually only crashes the client, so if it is the entire server that crashes I’m not sure, try removing the spawn by deleting any lines of code that spawn the npc in autospawn.cfg

the blood runes thing, on alot of servers where blood runes crash the server, they just swapped blood runes for ecto-tokens or another item.

you should look up a tutorial on this as I am not entirely sure on hwo to do it.

and for the lagging out of the server (first thing u complained about) try searching for the numbers in client.java (numbers such as 51, 45)

hope i covered most of it and I sure hope some of this helped

Read full topic

Every time this pops up [client-4-hihi]: Fatal: Internal error: unable to determine connection vertex! wp1=(53, 48), wp2=(55, 46), first=(51, 45)
